radiographic_examinations.findings: Subsegmental atelectasis in the lower lobes; no evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion; periappendiceal abscess measuring 6.7 x 5.6 cm with adjacent fatty stranding, significantly increased in size from previously measuring 3.4 x 3.2 cm.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Significantly increased in size from CT abdomen pelvis previously measuring 3.4 x 3.2 cm.
